name: TOMORROW.IO
description: Science and software company focused on providing weather intelligence services.
sampleDescriptions: Developing support for and potentially with the Federal government to improve weather forecasting and weather intelligence to better equip agencies for weather events and impacts.
Promoting Federal government support for private sector weather intelligence, to help address catastrophic climate change, extreme weather event early warning, etc.
